definition: to disobey/to violate/to separate/to go against

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: The exiles were forbidden to return at the peril of their lives.
sentences.chinese: 流放犯已被禁止返回，违者处死。

sentences.english: Fishing in this pond is forbidden; penalty $5.
sentences.chinese: 塘禁止钓鱼，违者罚款五元。

sentences.english: Offenders will be fined 2, 000 Syrian pounds _ about $45.
sentences.chinese: 违者将处以2000叙利亚币的罚款，约45美元。

sentences.english: Imposture is not allowed, violates will be punished as the regulation stipulates.
sentences.chinese: 体检时，不得冒名代替，违者按有关规定予以处理。

sentences.english: In the 17th century, Sultan Murad IV banned smoking on the pain of death.
sentences.chinese: 在17世纪，苏丹木拉四世禁止吸烟，违者处死。

sentences.english: Any violator shall be banned according to law and its operations shall be stopped.
sentences.chinese: 违者将依法予以取缔，停止运营。

sentences.english: It is an offense to litter handbills.
sentences.chinese: 请勿乱丢宣传单张，违者必究。

sentences.english: The harbor superintendence departments shall not accept the ship exit formalities of any violator.
sentences.chinese: 违者，港务监督部门不予以受理船舶人出境手续。

sentences.english: Offenders may face a fine of HK$1m and imprisonment of two years.
sentences.chinese: 违者最高可被罚款100万港元及监禁两年。

sentences.english: Prisoners were forbidden to approach the fence under pain of death .
sentences.chinese: 犯人严禁接近围栏，违者格杀勿论。

sentences.english: The emphasis in juvenile courts is upon rehabilitation of youthful offenders rather than punishment.
sentences.chinese: 少年法庭的重心是使青少年违者回归社会而非惩罚。

sentences.english: Violating this rule will result you an instant ban.
sentences.chinese: 违者将直接导致你的账号被禁言。

sentences.english: The juvenile delinquent was sent to the reformatory.
sentences.chinese: 该少年违者被关进教养院改造。

definition: must not/may not/not to be allowed/cannot
to violate a prohibition or ban/prohibited/illicit
